text: The International Baseball Federation (IBAF; Spanish: Federación Internacional de Béisbol, French: Fédération internationale de baseball) is the former worldwide sports organization recognized by the International Olympic Committee. They were in charge of deciding and executing the policy of the sport of baseball. ==Other websites== *International Baseball Federation website *Baseball live score service website Category:Baseball Category:International sports organizations based in Switzerland Category:Organizations based in Lausanne
title: International Baseball Federation
